name: 3-dihydro-1H-isoindol-1-one]
used in conjunction with cobalt neodecanoate
FoodContactSubstance: 2-2'-[1,3-Phenylenebis(methylene)]bis[2,3-dihydro-1H-isoindol-1-one] (CAS Reg. No. 935739-41-6), also known as m-Xylylenediamine-bis(phthalamide) (MXBI), used in conjunction with cobalt neodecanoate (CAS Reg. No. 27253-31-2).
